note.previous: uppatitaṃ vineti kodhaṃ, visaṭaṃ sappavisaṃva osadhehi

note.original: jiṇṇamiva tacaṃ (sī. syā. kaṃ. pī.), jiṇṇamivā tacaṃ (?)
note.previous: So bhikkhu jahāti orapāraṃ, urago jiṇṇamivattacaṃ
Yo nājjhagamā bhavesu sāraṃ, vicinaṃ pupphamiva
Yo nāccasārī na paccasārī, sabbaṃ vitathamidanti ñatvā

note.original: puna upessaṃ (sī. syā. kaṃ. pī.), punupeyya (ka.)

note.previous: Puttañca dāraṃ pitarañca mātaraṃ, dhanāni dhaññāni ca bandhavāni
me sutaṃ – ekaṃ samayaṃ bhagavā magadhesu viharati dakkhiṇāgirismiṃ

alternatives.alternative: kho, brāhmaṇa, kasāmi ca vapāmi ca; kasitvā ca vapitvā ca bhuñjāmī’’ti. ‘‘Na kho pana mayaṃ

note.previous: Ahampi kho, brāhmaṇa, kasāmi ca vapāmi ca; kasitvā ca vapitvā ca bhuñjāmī’’ti. Na kho pana mayaṃ
passāma bhoto gotamassa yugaṃ vā naṅgalaṃ vā phālaṃ vā pācanaṃ vā balibadde
Atha kho kasibhāradvājo brāhmaṇo mahatiyā kaṃsapātiyā pāyasaṃ
vaḍḍhetvā bhagavato upanāmesi – bhuñjatu bhavaṃ gotamo pāyasaṃ. Kassako bhavaṃ; yaṃ hi bhavaṃ gotamo amatapphalaṃ
kho kasibhāradvājo brāhmaṇo taṃ pāyasaṃ appāṇake udake opilāpesi. Atha kho so pāyaso udake pakkhitto cicciṭāyati ciṭiciṭāyati sandhūpāyati sampadhūpāyati
, bho gotama! Seyyathāpi, bho gotama, nikkujjitaṃ vā ukkujjeyya, paṭicchannaṃ vā vivareyya, mūḷhassa vā maggaṃ ācikkheyya, andhakāre vā telapajjotaṃ dhāreyya, cakkhumanto rūpāni dakkhantīti

note.original: aññataro ca kho (sī. pī.), aññataro kho (syā. kaṃ. ka.)
note.previous: Alattha kho kasibhāradvājo brāhmaṇo bhagavato santike pabbajjaṃ, alattha upasampadaṃ. Acirūpasampanno kho panāyasmā bhāradvājo eko vūpakaṭṭho appamatto ātāpī pahitatto viharanto nacirasseva – yassatthāya kulaputtā sammadeva agārasmā anagāriyaṃ pabbajanti, tadanuttaraṃ – brahmacariyapariyosānaṃ diṭṭheva dhamme sayaṃ abhiññā sacchikatvā upasampajja vihāsi. Khīṇā jāti, vusitaṃ brahmacariyaṃ, kataṃ karaṇīyaṃ, nāparaṃ itthattāyā’’ti abbhaññāsi. Aññataro ca
Magge jīvati me brūhi puṭṭho, atha me āvikarohi maggadūsiṃ’’

note.original: yo mātaraṃ vā (sī. syā. kaṃ. pī.)
yo brāhmaṇaṃ vā (sī. syā. kaṃ. pī.)

note.previous: Addasā kho aggikabhāradvājo brāhmaṇo bhagavantaṃ dūratova āgacchantaṃ. Disvāna bhagavantaṃ etadavoca – tatreva
Yo cattānaṃ samukkaṃse, pare ca mavajānāti

note.original: bhūtā vā sambhavesī vā (syā. kaṃ. pī. ka.)
naṃ kañci (sī. pī.), naṃ kiñci (syā.), na kiñci (ka.)
note.previous: Na paro paraṃ nikubbetha, nātimaññetha katthaci na kañci
Atho vebhūtiyaṃ nāha, mantā atthaṃ ca
Niyyānaṃ pucchito brūhi, kathaṃ dukkhā pamuccati’’

note.original: pahāya (ka. sī. ka.), samāya (ka.) pa + mī + tvā = pamāya, yathā nissāyātipadaṃ
note.extra: pa + mī + tvā = pamāya, yathā nissāyātipadaṃ

note.previous: Sabbañjahaṃ taṇhakkhaye vimuttaṃ, taṃ vāpi dhīrā muni

note.original: daharo ca majjho ca munī (sī. syā. kaṃ. pī.)
note.previous: Yo saññatatto na karoti pāpaṃ, daharo majjhimo ca muni
Parapāṇarodhāya gihī asaññato, niccaṃ munī rakkhati pāṇine
